amendment.description: To require the Annual Report on International Religious Freedom to include a section on Anti-Semitism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1186 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1186 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Voinovich to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9191-9194; text: CR S9193) To require the Annual Report on International Religious Freedom to include a section on Anti-Semitism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1186 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Voinovich to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1186 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
